recipe.title: How to Make Banana Bread
recipe.intro: Banana bread is a classic treat in Australian cafÃ©s. It is a great way to use ripe bananas. It is moist, sweet, and easy to make.
recipe.ingredients: ripe bananas, plain flour, sugar, butter, eggs, baking powder, vanilla extract, cinnamon, walnuts (optional)
steps: **Mash** three ripe bananas in a bowl with a fork.
**Melt** the butter and **mix** it with the sugar, eggs, and vanilla.
**Add** the mashed bananas to the wet mixture and **stir** well.
**Sift** the flour, baking powder, and cinnamon into the bowl and **fold** gently.
**Pour** the batter into a loaf tin and **bake** for 50 to 60 minutes. **Cool** before slicing!

quiz1.explanation_correct: æ­£è§£ï¼"Preheat the oven to 180 degrees Celsius."

review.text: I had brunch at Harbour Lights CafÃ© near the marina. I ordered a slice of banana bread with butter and a cappuccino. The banana bread was warm and moist. It had a lovely cinnamon flavour and little pieces of walnut inside. The slice was thick and generous. I sat on the deck and watched the boats in the harbour. The staff were friendly and the service was fast. This cafÃ© has the best banana bread in Cairns!

quiz2.explanation_correct: æ­£è§£ï¼"I ordered a slice of banana bread with butter and a cappuccino."

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: Good morning! Welcome to Harbour Lights CafÃ©. Here is the menu.

lines.speaker: Charlotte
lines.text: Thank you! Do you have banana bread today?

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: Yes, we do! It is freshly baked this morning.

lines.speaker: Charlotte
lines.text: Lovely! Can I have a slice, please? Is it possible to have it toasted?

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: Of course! Would you like butter on top?

lines.speaker: Charlotte
lines.text: Yes, please. And a cappuccino with oat milk, if you have it.

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: We do have oat milk! Regular or large cappuccino?

lines.speaker: Charlotte
lines.text: Large, please. I need the energy today!

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: No worries! That will be fourteen dollars fifty.

lines.speaker: Charlotte
lines.text: Here is my card. Thank you so much!

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: Thank you! I will bring everything to your table. Enjoy your brunch!

quiz3.explanation_correct: æ­£è§£ï¼"And a cappuccino with oat milk, if you have it."

part_a.full_text: I made banana bread for you! Oh, thank you! It smells amazing. I used my mum's recipe. It has cinnamon and walnuts inside. Can I try a piece now? Of course! Let me cut a slice for you. Mm, this is so moist and delicious! I am glad you like it. I will write down the recipe for you.

gaps.before: I will write down the recipe for

part_b.full_text: Good morning! Here is our breakfast menu at Coconut Grove CafÃ©. We open at seven o'clock every day. Our most popular item is the banana bread with honey butter. It costs eight dollars. We also have avocado toast for twelve dollars and a big breakfast plate for eighteen dollars. All breakfast items come with a free cup of filter coffee. We use local bananas from North Queensland farms. Our kitchen stops serving breakfast at eleven thirty. Lunch service starts at twelve o'clock. Please ask your waiter if you have any questions!

try_it.example: This morning, I came to the cafÃ© at seven o'clock. I prepared banana bread and made coffee. A nice lady ordered banana bread with oat milk cappuccino. She said it was delicious!
